mapper.select:
select * from tbl_detailed_list_information
and detailed_list_type = #{detailedListType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and applicant_id = #{applicantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and detailed_list_code like CONCAT('%',#{detailedListCode},'%')
and detailed_list_name like CONCAT('%',#{detailedListName},'%')
and staff_name like CONCAT('%',#{staffName},'%')
and receiving_deliverer_person_name like CONCAT('%',#{receivingDelivererPersonName},'%')
and receiving_deliverer_person_phone like CONCAT('%',#{receivingDelivererPersonPhone},'%')
and receiving_deliverer_person_address like CONCAT('%',#{receivingDelivererPersonAddress},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{status},'%')
